```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(EviewsR)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = T,prompt = T,fig.align = "center",fig.pos="h",eval = T)

# set_eviews_path("eviews10")
```



```{eviews EviewsR,eval=T,page=T,echo=F}      
  'This is some comment in EViews program, feel free to write anything
  
  wfcreate(wf=EviewsR,page=EviewsR) m 2000 2022
  for %y Created By a voluntary author
  pagecreate(page={%y}) EviewsR m 2000 2022
  next
  pageselect EviewsR
  
  table EviewsRTable
  for !j=1 to 7
  EviewsRTable(1,{!j})="Header"+" "+@str({!j})
  next
  for !i=1 to 10
  for !j=1 to 7
  EviewsRTable({!i}+1,{!j})=@str({!i})+","+@str({!j})
  EviewsRTable.save(t=csv) EviewsRTable
  next
  next 
  
  rndseed 123456
  genr x=@cumsum(nrnd)
  genr y=@cumsum(nrnd)
  graph x_graph.line x
  graph y_graph.line y
  equation ols.ls y c x
  freeze(EviewsROLS,mode=overwrite) ols
  wfsave EviewsR
```
